headers.subject: Re: Cannot Start SketchUp
headers.received: by ywh26 with SMTP id 26so198569ywh.9 for <google.larry.sergey@a.markmail.org>; Thu, 13 Aug 2009 06:34:44 -0700 (PDT)
headers.x-http-useragent: Mozilla/4.0 (compatible; MSIE 7.0; Windows NT 6.0; Trident/4.0; SLCC1; .NET CLR 2.0.50727; .NET CLR 3.5.30729; InfoPath.2; .NET CLR 1.1.4322; .NET CLR 3.0.30729),gzip(gfe),gzip(gfe)

body.para: I have the same behaviour... but with SketchUP Free. At first times I was able to start sketchup and make a drawing. Then, without anything reason I was unable to start it (as I allways get a bug splat screen). I rebooted the PC, uninstalled (clean the file system and registry for sketchup entries) e reinstall, rebooted again, but still getting the bug splat screen...

quote.quotepara: I've installed sketchup 7Pro (trial) on my Windows XP PC. When it starts is shows the usual welcome screen asking to input a license , or choose template, continue trial etc. but whatever option i click on, that window disappears and the googleBugSplaterror window comes up. I've installed and uninstalled about 5 times, with no difference.
